results.title: Alex and the beast within
results.creator_credit: David Atkinson, John Bird and Dominic O'Brien
results.brief_description: Cities are a hard place, some say they’re filled with sharks. One man haunted by this belief disappears into his fantasy emerging with the realisation that perhaps there are dragons too.

results.title: Penguins off the page
results.creator_credit: Jon Rowdon and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “RMIT Collection”.
A plasticine animation in a live action classroom. Today’s biology lesson is about the different types of penguins. The peculiar magic of wildlife comes to the classroom as penguins colonise his desk to bring each of the species of penguins to life. As the lesson progresses the class watches each species appear and play amongst the mess on the teacher’s desk.

results.title: A Collection of interactive work created by students (MAC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “RMIT Collection”.
Interactive works of the Graduate Diploma Students of Animation and Interactive Media at RMIT. The titles included are: ‘Haiku Dada’ - Felix Hude; ‘Arlecchino’ - Rosanna Morales; ‘Autograph’ - Mark Lycette; ‘Totally Rediculuos’ - Greg Zaritski; ‘Travels with cod’ - Gwyn Wethereld; ‘The Swear Club’ - Michael Buckley; ‘Equinox’ - Paul Western-Pittard.
